item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...

item.title: The Ars VR headset showdown-Oculus Rift vs. HTC Vive
item.description:
The Ars VR headset showdown-Oculus Rift vs. HTC Vive

In our original reviews of the Oculus Rift and the HTC Vive, we tried very hard to examine these virtual reality systems on their own merits without constant comparisons to the competition. But no product exists in a vacuum. After years of buildup, we're now faced with two competitive, PC-tethered VR headsets hitting the market right next to each other.

item.title: 7 Gadgets That'll Actually Get You Excited to Work Out
item.description:
7 Gadgets That'll Actually Get You Excited to Work Out

Gadgets and devices that make working out more enjoyable, including games, music players, and muscle trackers.

item.title: Experience a NASA Spacewalk Through the Lens of a GoPro Camera
item.description:
Experience a NASA Spacewalk Through the Lens of a GoPro Camera

Want to see what it's like to "walk" around in space outside the International Space Station? NASA wants to show you. The agency recently strapped GoPro cameras onto two astronauts to capture the wonder of spacewalks from their perspective.

item.title: The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot
item.description:
The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot

Crown-of-thorns starfish are the zombies of the sea. They won't die even if you cut them in half. To kill one, you must dismember it completely-or inject it with poisonous (to them) bile salts. Instead of braaains, these zombies munch coral, and off the coast of Australia, infestations of the beasts are damaging the Great Barrier Reef at an alarming rate.
